podcasts.title: Indie vs. Corporate - Which path is right for you?
podcasts.description: In this episode, we discuss the pros and cons of working as an indie developer vs. a corporate employee. We explore the challenges and rewards of both paths, and the importance of finding a balance between the two.

podcasts.title: From Tier-3 College to Ex- Zomato Engineer and PhonePe
podcasts.description: In this episode, we discuss my journey from a Tier-3 college to an ex-Zomato engineer and now a PhonePe engineer. We explore the challenges I faced and how I overcame them to achieve my goals.

podcasts.title: Content Creator's Chat
podcasts.description: In this podcast, we discussed latest announcements in WWDC with respect to content creation, and how it benefits consumers. We also opened the panel for any questions viewers might have had with respect to it.
